description:
Twill weave, vertical and horizontal stripes in different colors that emphasize the twill pattern. 3 orange warp. Yellow, tan & metallic bronze weft. Twill. Machine edged all 4 sides. Stapled to 8.5x11\" card with 99.1.1200.3. \"H8-A\"
and a lengthy weaving description also stapled to card (orange, yellow, tan,  bronze metallic beige)
title: Pomegranate
